title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 702.4 - Binding effect
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 702.4 - Binding effect

State Regulations

Declaratory rulings, issued in response to a petition
complying with the terms of this Part, shall be binding upon the department
unless altered or set aside by a court or prospectively changed by the
department. No opinion, letter or advice shall be deemed a declaratory ruling
unless it contains a statement that it is a declaratory ruling and is issued by
the counsel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
702.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
